mean_cn: n. 避孕品，避孕用具；  adj. 避孕的
mean_en: a drug or device (such as birth control pills or a condom) that is used to prevent a woman from becoming pregnant
sentence: If you have sex, contraceptives are important so you don't get pregnant or sick.
sentence_trans: 做爱的时候避孕用具很重要，这样才不会怀孕或染病。
word_etyma: contra反对，相反 ＋ cept拿，抓 ＋ ive...的 → contraceptive避孕的
